bibl.title: Shards from Kolonos: Studies in Sophoclean Fragments

bibl.seg: MARCH Jenny, Sophocles' Tereus and Euripides' Medea.
Alan H. SOMMERSTEIN (Ed.), Shards from Kolonos: Studies in Sophoclean Fragments = Le Rane. 34 (Bari, 2003) pp. 139-161.
Development of a paper presented in 1999 at the first A.G. Leventis Conference at the University of Edinburgh and since published in the Conference volume, Word and Image in Ancient Greece (2000).
